channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Relief, 21st-century style: As wildfires burn, GoFundMe becomes a repository of harrowing stories

item.title: Israel and Hamas reach ceasefire and hostage release deal after 'intensive diplomacy'

item.title: Firefighters report progress against LA blazes as winds pick up again

item.title: Biden reacts to the Israel-Hamas ceasefire, hostage release deal | Special Report
item.description: President Biden addressed the deal brokered by the U.S., Qatar and Egypt for a ceasefire and hostage release between Israel and Hamas. The deal comes ...

item.title: Concerns about gentrification hang over LA community's destruction

item.title: Firefighters need better weather to fight California’s flames. When will they get relief?
World leaders react to Israel, Hamas ceasefire deal
item.description: After 15 months of war, Israel and Hamas have reached a ceasefire deal. World leaders from across the globe shared their reactions to the agreement.

item.title: Walgreens says locking up products from shoplifters hurt sales
item.description: Keeping products under lock and key dissuaded customers from purchasing them, Walgreens said in earnings call.

item.title: Gazans shed tears of joy, disbelief at news of ceasefire deal

item.title: New England youth basketball coach accused of running down parent with car after game
Former Ankeny chamber CEO arrested for allegedly taking $250,000 from organization
What the new inflation report means for mortgage rates
item.description: Inflation ticked back up during the last month of the year, which could have an impact on mortgage rates.

item.title: What's in the ceasefire deal between Israel and Hamas
item.description: The deal will take place in three different phases, each of which will last for six weeks, according to U.S. and Qatari officials.

item.title: As climate risks mount, U.S. homeowners face soaring insurance bills
item.description: Insurance companies are canceling homeowner policies across the U.S. — even in regions that aren't considered climate hot spots.

item.title: Sen. Adam Schiff asks Bondi if she will investigate Jack Smith or Liz Cheney
Bondi says she won't play politics as attorney general but doesn't rule out probes of Trump foes
